§ 40724. Priority of youth participation In carrying out the Civilian Marksmanship Program, the corporation shall give priority to activities that benefit firearms safety, training, and competition for youth and that reach as many youth participants as possible. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1338.)
